legal_information.cpyright: © Copyright 2023 HP Development Company, L.P. The information contained herein is subject to change without notice. The only warranties for HP products and services are set forth in the express warranty statements accompanying such products and services. Nothing herein should be construed as constituting an additional warranty. HP shall not be liable for technical or editorial errors or omissions contained herein.
legal_information.prodlogos: High speed USB; Works with Windows 10; Windows 7; Mac Smiley; Mac Universal; Mopria; Wi-Fi certified; Bluetooth; Airprint; ColorLock; Instant Ink; Energy Star (For countries that apply); Recycle; Fragile; Keep out of rain; This side up; PAP20; HP Total Care; Smart Way (for countries that apply); Stack height (NA:7, EMEA 6, AP 5); CE (for countries that apply); Green Dot (for countries that apply); French TriMan (for countries that apply); EAC Logo (for countries that apply); KCCC Logo + approval number (Korea); AP Language bubble (AP only); RMN (regulatory model number); Regionalize mobius loop

cartridges_and_printheads.label: Cartridges and Printheads
cartridges_and_printheads.suppliescartridge: HP 67 Black Original Ink Cartridge (~120 pages yield) 3YM56AN; HP 67XL Black High Yield Original Ink Cartridge (~240 pages yield) 3YM57AN; HP 67 Tri-Color Original Ink Cartridge (~100 pages yield) 3YM55AN; HP 67XL Tri-Color High-Yield Original Ink Cartridge (~200 pages yield) 3YM58AN; HP 305 Black Original Ink Cartridge (~120 pages yield) 3YM61AE; HP 305XL Black High-Yield Original Ink Cartridge (~240 pages yield) 3YM62AE; HP 305 Tri-Color Original Ink Cartridge (~100 pages yield) 3YM60AE; HP 305XL Tri-Color High-Yield Original Ink Cartridge (~200 pages yield) 3YM63AE. Actual yield varies considerably based on content of printed pages and other factors. For details see http://www.hp.com/go/learnaboutsupplies

box_contents.label: Box contents

whatsinboxftntnbr.label: What is in the box footnote number

supported_printing_media.label: Supported Printing Media
supported_printing_media.mediasizestdus: Letter; legal; 4 x 6 in; 5 x 7 in; 8 x 10 in; No. 10 envelopes
supported_printing_media.mediatype: Plain paper, photo paper, brochure paper, envelopes and other specialty inkjet papers
supported_printing_media.mediaweightmet: A4: 60 to 90 g/m²; HP envelopes: 75 to 90 g/m²; HP cards: up to 200 g/m²; HP 10 x 15 cm photo paper: up to 300 g/m²
supported_printing_media.mediaweightus: Letter: 16 to 32 lb; HP envelopes: 20 to 24 lb; HP cards: up to 110 lb; HP 4 x 6 inch photo paper: up to 145 lb

footnotes.label: Footnotes
footnotes.tsfootnote_03: [3] Speed specifications have been updated to reflect current industry testing methods.
footnotes.tsfootnote_04: [4] Average based on ISO/IEC 24711 or HP testing methodology and continuous printing. Actual yield varies considerably based on content of printed pages and other factors. For details see http://hp.com/go/learnaboutsupplies
footnotes.tsfootnote_06: [6] Either after first page or after first set of ISO test pages. For details see http://www.hp.com/go/printerclaims
footnotes.tsfootnote_07: [7] For more information about page yields for replacement cartridges see http://hp.com/go/learnaboutsupplies for setup cartridges click on Setup supplies link on the same page.
footnotes.tsfootnote_02: [2] Power requirements are based on the country/region where the printer is sold. Do not convert operating voltages. This will damage the printer and void the product warranty.
footnotes.tsfootnote_08: [8] Local printing requires mobile device and printer to be on the same network or have a direct wireless connection to the printer. Wireless performance is dependent on physical environment and distance from access point. Wireless operations are compatible with 2.4 GHz operations only. Remote printing requires an Internet connection to an HP web-connected printer. App or software and HP Smart app account registration may also be required. Wireless broadband use requires separately purchased service contract for mobile devices. Check with service provider for coverage and availability in your area. Learn more at http://www.hp.com/go/mobileprinting

system_requirements.sysreqminmac: macOS v10.14 Mojave, macOS v10.15 Catalina, macOS v11 Big Sur; 2 GB HD; Internet required

system_requirements.sysreqsrec: Windows 10, 7: 32-bit or 64-bit, 2 GB available hard disk space, Internet connection, Internet Explorer.
system_requirements.sysreqsrecmac: macOS v10.14 Mojave, macOS v10.15 Catalina, macOS v11 Big Sur;

supported_operating_systems.ossuppted: Windows 11; Windows 10; Windows 7; macOS 10.12 Sierra; macOS 10.14 Mojave; macOS 10.15 Catalina; macOS 11 Big Sur; Chrome OS

print_resolution.prntresclrbest: Up to 4800 x 1200 optimized dpi color (when printing from a computer on selected HP photo papers and 1200 input dpi)

services.label: Services
services.servsuppfeatures: With services, software, solutions and support from HP Total Care, you can use, protect and enjoy your HP technology; one-year technical support; one-year limited hardware warranty; access to 24/7 award-winning support services through http://www.hp.com/support; to improve your product experience, please take the time to register at http://www.register.hp.com
services.servsuppopt: Protect your investment—HP Total Care offers a variety of extended warranties and services, go to http://www.hp.com/support

printer_specifications.label: Printer Specifications

directprntcap.label: Storage device and direct print support

printer_specifications.dutycycleavgprntvolftnt: HP recommends that the number of printed pages per month be within the stated range for optimum device performance, based on factors including supplies replacement
printer_specifications.dutycycleftnt: Duty cycle is defined as the maximum number of pages per month of imaged output. This value provides a comparison of product robustness in relation to other HP Color InkJet devices
printer_specifications.usersandprintvol: For teams up to 3 users; Prints up to 100 pages/month
printer_specifications.prntlangstd: HP PCL 3 GUI; HP PCLm (HP Apps/UPD); URF (AirPrint)
printer_specifications.topfeatureslist: Wireless; HP+; HP Instant Ink eligible; Print from phone or tablet

advanced_features.label: Advanced Features
advanced_features.faxadvfeat: Option to add files from your phone file/photos, Camera scan or Printer scanner, Option to easily add cover page and save the cover page template, Access to Fax history to see all send faxes and drafts, Ability to edit and resent fax from History, Easily print fax confirmation

scanner_specifications.label: Scanner Specifications
scanner_specifications.dutycycleavgscanvolftnt: HP recommends that the number of scanned pages per month be within the stated range for optimum device performance

product_names.label: Product Names
product_names.prodlongnamespecs: HP DeskJet 2742e All-in-One Printer with Bonus 6 Months Instant Ink
product_names.prodshortnamespecs: HP DeskJet 2742e All-in-One Printer, Home, Print, copy, scan, Wireless; HP+; HP Instant Ink eligible; Print from phone or tablet

features.label: Features
features.facet_feat: Wireless; Print from phone or tablet; Scan to PDF

limited_messaging_scenarios.label: Limited Messaging Scenarios
limited_messaging_scenarios.ltdproddes_medium: HP Photo and Document All-in-One Printers deliver the versatility to print everything from documents, email and web pages to lab-quality photos. With copy and scan capabilities too, these printers are perfect for home, school or work projects.

footnotes.label: Footnotes
footnotes.msgfootnote_01: [1] Wireless operations are compatible with 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz operations only. Learn more at http://www.hp.com/go/mobileprinting. Wi-Fi is a registered trademark of Wi-Fi Alliance®. Supports both 5.0 GHz and 2.4 GHz using up to 12 non-overlapping channels vs only 3 non-overlapping channels for 2.4 GHz only. Supports 5.0 GHz band (up to 150 mbps) vs 2.4 GHz band (up to 72.2 mbps). Internet access required and must be purchased separately.
footnotes.msgfootnote_02: [2] Requires the HP Smart app download. For details on local printing requirements see www.hp.com/go/mobileprinting. Certain features/software are available in English language only, and differ between desktop and mobile applications. Subscription may be required; subscription may not be available in all countries. See details at http://hpsmart.com . Internet access required and must be purchased separately. HP account required for full functionality. List of supported operating systems available in app stores. Fax capabilities are for sending a fax only. After 2 years, monthly fee applies to continue advanced features with HP Smart Advance. HP Smart Advance is not available in all countries. For more information, see www.hpsmart.com.
footnotes.msgfootnote_03: [3] 2yrs HP Warranty in total. Refer to the documentation in the printer box for further information on HP warranty. HP Warranty benefits apply in addition to any statutory rights provided under applicable consumer protection laws related to non-conformity of goods with the contract of sale. Such consumer statutory rights are not limited or affected in any manner by the HP Warranty. See: ​https://support.hp.com/gb-en/document/c03922002?openCLC=true
footnotes.msgfootnote_07: [7] Based on monthly subscription cost of HP Instant Ink 700-page plans without purchase of additional sets of pages compared to cost per page to print ISO/IEC 24711 pages on most in-class, traditional A4 colour inkjet cartridge printers & MFPs using original standard capacity cartridges priced for: majority of EMEA countries <200 Euro; UK <200 GBP. Sale prices not considered for this study. HP Ink Advantage printers excluded due to non-standard hardware & supplies model. Buyers Lab July 2020 study commissioned by HP, based on publicly available information as of June 1, 2020. Printers selected by market share in IDC Quarterly Hardcopy Peripherals Tracker - Final Historical 2020Q1. For details: http://www.keypointintelligence.com/HPInstantInkROW
footnotes.msgfootnote_08: [8] Based on plan usage, Internet connection to eligible HP printer, valid credit/debit card, email address, and delivery service in your geographic area.
footnotes.msgfootnote_09: [9] Utilizing technology in the HP+ system and compared to HP standard consumer printers without HP+. HP+ printers are ready when you are with improved connectivity utilizing Smart Driver and Print/Scan Doctor technology, more secure with Smart Security technology, more productive through HP Smart Advance features included for 2 years, and more sustainable by enabling Forest First printing and net-zero deforestation prints.
footnotes.msgfootnote_10: [10] Change or cancel your plan at any time online. If you decide to cancel your HP Instant Ink plan you can go back to using HP original Standard or XL cartridges. Plan upgrades are effective immediately and the charges will be applied retrospectively or in the next billing cycle, depending on user choice. Plan downgrades and cancellations are effective after the last day of the current billing period. For full details go to http://www.instantink.hpconnected.com/terms.
footnotes.msgfootnote_11: [11] HP works collaboratively with our partners WWF and Arbor Day Foundation to manage, restore, and protect forests around the world through a variety of projects. With HP+, every print - regardless of paper brand – is addressed through HP’s Forest Positive Framework to counteract risks of deforestation. HP brand paper is sourced only from certified responsibly managed forests or from recycled content. For other brands of paper, HP invests in forest restoration, protection or management projects in key regions, for instance Brazil, sufficient to balance any paper used by HP+ customers that may not have been responsibly sourced. To learn more visit http://www.hp.com/forestfirst
footnotes.msgfootnote_12: [12] Program availability varies. Original HP cartridge return and recycling is currently available in more than 60 countries, territories and regions in Asia, Africa, Europe, and North and South America through the HP Planet Partners program. Program availability varies. For details, see http://hp.com/recycle
footnotes.msgfootnote_13: [13] Up to 2 years HP Warranty in total, subject to activation of HP+ at set up. Two years consist of: (1) one year standard HP warranty; (2) one year extra HP warranty through HP+ activation at setup. Refer to the documentation in the printer box for further information on HP warranty.
footnotes.msgfootnote_04: [4] Mobile device needs to support Bluetooth v4.2+ and be enabled. A mobile app such as HP ePrint or HP Smart must be installed and opened for printing. Mobile device must be within 5 feet of the printer. For details, see http://www.hp.com/go/bleprinting. Bluetooth is a trademark owned by its proprietor and used by HP under license.
footnotes.msgfootnote_05: [5] Instant Ink sign up required. Instant Ink not available in all countries. Subject to monthly page limit of plan selected. Must complete Instant Ink signup within 7 days of setting up the printer with the HP-recommended setup process as indicated in the instructions that came with your printer. Unless service is cancelled within the promotional period online at http://hpinstantink.com , a monthly service fee, based on the plan chosen, plus tax and overage fees will be charged to your credit/debit card. Customer will be charged for any overage fees and applicable taxes at the end of each month in the promotional period. Use of in-box ink or toner cartridge is included in period of offer. One offer redeemable per printer. Included months offer with Instant Ink subject to change after 4.30.2022. Offer cannot be redeemed for cash. Setup Offer may be combined with other offers; see terms and conditions of the other offer for more details. Requires a valid credit/debit card, an email address, and Internet connection to printer. See additional offer information available during online signup process. For service details, see http://hpinstantink.com
footnotes.msgfootnote_06: [6] Based on monthly subscription cost of Instant Ink 700-page plans without purchase of additional sets of pages compared to cost per page to print ISO/IEC 24711 pages on most in-class, traditional A4 color inkjet cartridge printers & MFPs using original standard capacity cartridges priced for: Australia <299 AUD; New Zealand <349 NZD; Canada <=399 CAD & United States <399 USD. Sale prices not considered for this study. HP Ink Advantage printers excluded due to non-standard hardware & supplies model. Buyers Lab July 2020 study commissioned by HP, based on publicly available information as of June 1, 2020. Printers selected by market share in IDC Quarterly Hardcopy Peripherals Tracker - Final Historical 2020Q1. For details: http://www.keypointintelligence.com/HPInstantInk.

technical_features.label: Technical Features
technical_features.featurestech_05_statement: HP Smart app; Apple AirPrint™; Chrome OS; Mopria-certified
technical_features.featurestech_01_statement: Black: Up to 7 ppm; Color: Up to 5 ppm
technical_features.featurestech_02_statement: Black (best): Up to 1200X 1200 rendered dpi (when Printing from a computer); Color (best): Up to 4800 x 1200 optimized dpi color (when printing from a computer on selected HP photo papers and 1200 input dpi)
technical_features.featurestech_03_statement: Hardware: Up to 1200 x 1200 dpi; Optical: Up to 1200 dpi

key_selling_points.label: Key Selling Points
key_selling_points.ksp_04_headline_medium: HP+, the smart printing system that thinks ahead so your printer is ready when you are, more secure and productive than ever.[9] Choose HP+ and get 6 months of Instant Ink[5] and 1 extra year of HP warranty with exclusive use of Original HP Ink.[13]
key_selling_points.ksp_04_suppt_01_medium: The optional HP+ printing system is smarter - it keeps itself up to date and ready to print[9]
key_selling_points.ksp_04_suppt_02_medium: First 6 months of Instant Ink included;[5] after 6 months, monthly fee charged automatically unless cancelled.
key_selling_points.ksp_04_suppt_03_medium: HP+ requires an HP account, internet connection, and use of original HP ink for the life of the printer.
key_selling_points.ksp_04_suppt_04_medium: Print and scan from anywhere with HP Smart app. Enjoy advanced productivity features for 2 years with HP+.[2]
key_selling_points.ksp_02_headline_medium: Designed to help keep you connected. Dual-band Wi-Fi® with self-reset enables better range and faster, more reliable connections.[1]
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_03_medium: Get quick and easy printing directly at the control panel.
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_04_medium: This printer is made from recycled printers and other electronics—more than 20% by weight of plastic.
key_selling_points.ksp_01_headline_medium: Setup is a breeze – use any device to get started in a few easy steps with HP Smart app.[2] Get versatile performance to print, scan, and copy.
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_01_medium: Get started fast with simple setup that guides you through each step, using HP Smart app.[2]
key_selling_points.ksp_01_suppt_02_medium: Easily handle tasks and get a lot from one device – print, scan, and copy.
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_01_medium: Get better range and faster, more reliable connections using dual-band Wi-Fi® with self-reset.[1]
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_02_medium: Get connected with Bluetooth® and start printing fast from your smartphone or tablet – easy setup.[6]
key_selling_points.ksp_02_suppt_03_medium: Built-in wireless capabilities let you easily access, print, and share resources on a network.[1]
key_selling_points.ksp_03_headline_medium: Never run out with Instant Ink - get ink, plus hassle-free delivery and recycling all starting at $0.99 a month.[8]
key_selling_points.ksp_03_headline_short: Print then and there. From anywhere [2]
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_01_medium: Easily print, scan, and copy everyday documents from your smartphone, using HP Smart app.[2]
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_02_medium: Eliminate steps in repetitive tasks with customizable Shortcuts.[2] Scan to the cloud, email, and more.[2]
key_selling_points.ksp_03_suppt_04_medium: Organize documents 50% faster with Shortcuts in HP Smart app [2,4]

features_group_2.label: Features Group 2
features_group_2.feature_02_suppt_02_medium: Get connected with Bluetooth® and start printing fast from your smartphone or tablet – easy setup.
features_group_2.feature_02_suppt_04_medium: Built-in wireless capabilities let you easily access, print, and share resources on a network.
features_group_2.feature_02_suppt_05_medium: Original HP ink cartridges deliver sharp text and vibrant graphics for all your everyday documents and photos.

target_market.label: Target Market
target_market.tmkt_overview_medium: Home printer users who want reliable, simple and easy-to-use technology solutions to print, scan, and copy everyday documents from home.

features_group_1.label: Features Group 1
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_04_medium: With HP Smart app, get high-quality scanning and sharing – plus easily make copies – from your smartphone.
features_group_1.feature_01_headline_03_statement: Printing from your smartphone just got easier
features_group_1.feature_01_headline_06_statement: HP+, the cloud-connected, smart printing system
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_01_medium: Get started fast with simple setup that guides you through each step, using HP Smart app
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_02_medium: Get better range and faster, more reliable connections using dual-band Wi-Fi® with self-reset.
features_group_1.feature_01_headline_04_statement: Amazing scanning, now on your smartphone
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_05_medium: Get versatile performance and print, scan, and copy.
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_06_medium: An HP+ printer is ready when you are, more secure and productive than ever.[9]
features_group_1.feature_01_suppt_03_medium: Easily print everyday documents from your smartphone, using HP Smart app.

key_differentiators.label: Key Differentiators
key_differentiators.purchasemotivator: Designed for a hassle-free experience for printing and scanning everyday documents. Easy to set up and print from any device using HP Smart app[2], worry-free wireless[1] with dual-band with self-reset and all the HP+ benefits.

product_description.label: Product Description
product_description.hpplusdisclaim: This is an HP+ enabled printer. Choose HP+ at product setup to activate benefits. HP+ requires an HP account, ongoing connection to the internet, and exclusive use of Original HP Ink cartridges for the life of the printer. More at:
product_description.dynsecdisclaim: Certain HP printers are intended to work only with cartridges that have a new or reused HP chip or electronic circuitry. These printers use dynamic security measures to block cartridges using a non-HP chip or electronic circuitry. Periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures and block cartridges that previously worked. Reused HP chips and electronic circuitry enable the use of reused, remanufactured, and refilled cartridges.
product_description.proddes_overview_medium: All the basics, now with easy-to-use features. Print, scan, and copy everyday documents, and get worry-free wireless.[1] Get simple setup with HP Smart app.[2] Choose HP+ when you set up your printer to activate exclusive benefits.
product_description.proddes_overview_short: All the essentials – easy setup with HP Smart app,[2] worry-free wireless,[1] and ink savings.[6]
product_description.proddesdisclaim: This printer is intended to work only with cartridges that have new or reused HP electronic circuitry, and it uses dynamic security measures to block cartridges using modified or non-HP circuitry. Periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures and block cartridges that previously worked. Reused HP electronic circuitry enables the use of reused, remanufactured, and refilled cartridges. More at:
